definition: to lift/to pry open/to lever open
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to pick a lock/to force a lock
to break in/to force a door

sentences.english: The lock with the lock cylinder can prevent the lock from being pried and has better safety.
sentences.chinese: 采用该锁芯的锁可以防撬，有很好的安全性。

sentences.english: The landlord took a toolkit down and tried to pry the nails out when groaning at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 房东从楼上拿了一把工具下来，一边撬铁钉一边埋怨。

sentences.english: Old nun door every night by prize, what is man?
sentences.chinese: 老尼姑家的门夜夜被撬，究竟是人是鬼？

sentences.english: They levered up that big stone in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他们把花园里的大石头撬了起来。

sentences.english: What if we get burgled while we're on holiday?
sentences.chinese: 要是我们度假时家里被撬了怎么办？

sentences.english: No matter how many people tried to lever its mouth open, it held onto Cai's arm.
sentences.chinese: 不管人们怎么撬，狗还是紧紧地咬在蔡的臂上。

sentences.english: The researchers of science broke out a sled from the ice.
sentences.chinese: 科考人员从冰中取出一个雪撬。

sentences.english: Each cash truck had two tamperproof combination locks.
sentences.chinese: 每辆现金车都装有两把防撬破的字码锁。

sentences.english: They used picks and sledges to break the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 他们用镐和撬来打碎这些岩石。

sentences.english: Scott's use of sledges and horses was a success.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特的铁撬没有坏和他的马没有受伤。
当圣诞老人的雪撬铃响的时候。

sentences.english: We had a lot of trouble levering the roots out.
sentences.chinese: 在撬树根时我们遇到了很多麻烦。

sentences.english: A malicious meddler who tries to discover sensitive information by poking around.
sentences.chinese: 恶意干预谁试图发现敏感信息的撬拨左右。

sentences.english: Method Treat 51 cases with internal fixation of steel needle pry-poking reposition and Chinese drug.
sentences.chinese: 采用钢针撬拨复位克氏针内固定结合中药治疗51例。

sentences.english: Just like a real bobsled ride, only more dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 如同真正的长撬滑行，甚至更加危险。

sentences.english: Enter the boiler room and pick up the CROWBAR hanging on the left arch pillar.
sentences.chinese: 进入锅炉房，拿起铁撬左侧拱支柱悬挂。

definition: to pick a lock/to force a lock
to break in/to force a door
locked in (with the door locked from the outside)
